item.title: DN Ã— iPhone
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: Introducing Designer News for the iPhone. Nothing more, nothing less but the full DN experience. Scroll, tap and swipe. Gimmick-free interface not just for designers, and that’s a good thing. Content that fits. One of the few entries that feature landscape orientation. PS: This isn’t the official DN app. It’s my entry for the Design+Code Giveaway contest organized by LayerVault. I started using LayerVault because of this contest and I have to say it’s much better suited for a design workflow than Dropbox.
